args:
Given this political fundraising email, respond with the name of the committee in the disclaimer that begins with Paid for by but does not include Paid for by, the committee address or the treasurer name. If no committee is present, return "None". Do not include any other text, no yapping.
name: Adam Schiff
email: reply@e.adamschiff.com
subject: Trump called me “total scum”
body: [ https://act.adamschiff.com/go/62?t=1001&akid;=8121%2E5257348%2EnSb5EY ]Adam Schiff for Senate Derek, stop me if you’ve heard this before: Donald Trump’s campaign claims that he’s a serious candidate, taking the rally stage to defend his record and talk about his agenda. But he gets introduced by racist, sexist, divisive speakers. Who ramble almost as much as he does. When Trump takes the stage, he launches into an incoherent, meandering speech, lacking in policy proposals, and chock full of lies and attacks against his political opponents, including me. [ https://act.adamschiff.com/go/2907?c0=nov2024_abs_em.SALZ0e&refcode;=AU_ABS_FR_GEN_RES_AC90_20241101_PM1_V1_S1&email;=&t;=1004&akid;=8121%2E5257348%2EnSb5EY ]That’s exactly what happened yesterday at his rally in New Mexico. Derek, the attacks don’t phase me anymore, but with precious little time left for undecided voters to make their decisions at the ballot box, we can’t let their final impression of me come from a Trump screed. Please rush a contribution to boost our voter outreach in the final days of this election. If you've saved your payment information with ActBlue Express, your donation will go through immediately: [ https://act.adamschiff.com/go/2142?c0=nov2024_abs_em.XLxVQB&refcode;=AU_ABS_FR_GEN_RES_AC90_20241101_PM1_V1_S1&email;=&amount;=10&t;=1005&akid;=8121%2E5257348%2EnSb5EY ]EXPRESS DONATE $10 [ https://act.adamschiff.com/go/2142?c0=nov2024_abs_em.XLxVQB&refcode;=AU_ABS_FR_GEN_RES_AC90_20241101_PM1_V1_S1&email;=&amount;=25&t;=1006&akid;=8121%2E5257348%2EnSb5EY ]EXPRESS DONATE $25 [ https://act.adamschiff.com/go/2142?c0=nov2024_abs_em.XLxVQB&refcode;=AU_ABS_FR_GEN_RES_AC90_20241101_PM1_V1_S1&email;=&amount;=50&t;=1007&akid;=8121%2E5257348%2EnSb5EY ]EXPRESS DONATE $50 [ https://act.adamschiff.com/go/2142?c0=nov2024_abs_em.XLxVQB&refcode;=AU_ABS_FR_GEN_RES_AC90_20241101_PM1_V1_S1&email;=&amount;=100&t;=1008&akid;=8121%2E5257348%2EnSb5EY ]EXPRESS DONATE $100 [ https://act.adamschiff.com/go/2142?c0=nov2024_abs_em.XLxVQB&refcode;=AU_ABS_FR_GEN_RES_AC90_20241101_PM1_V1_S1&email;=&amount;=250&t;=1009&akid;=8121%2E5257348%2EnSb5EY ]EXPRESS DONATE $250 [ https://act.adamschiff.com/go/1014?c0=nov2024_abs_em.7WX_lH&refcode;=AU_ABS_FR_GEN_RES_AC90_20241101_PM1_V1_S1&email;=&t;=1010&akid;=8121%2E5257348%2EnSb5EY ]ANOTHER AMOUNT [ https://act.adamschiff.com/go/1014?c0=nov2024_abs_em.7WX_lH&refcode;=AU_ABS_FR_GEN_RES_AC90_20241101_PM1_V1_S1&t;=1011&akid;=8121%2E5257348%2EnSb5EY ]Trump attacking Adam at a rally in New Mexico “This is an election for the biggest and toughest job in history. There’s no tougher job than being president, and we get hit from the enemy inside. You know that, right? We get hit by the Adam Schiffs of the world. He's scum, total scum. They made up Russia, Russia, Russia hoax. They made up all the impeachment hoaxes. They make it up. They're bad people.” This is the closing message of Trump’s campaign. Ridiculous lies and smears against me, or his other “enemies.” While Trump pretends he’s a victim. If we want to talk about who is capable of taking on the biggest and toughest job in history, I’m going with a proven champion for the underdogs, a sharp prosecutor, a skilled communicator, and an empathetic, kind, humble leader — that’s Kamala Harris. Derek, we have just 4 days to deliver our message to voters across California. [ https://act.adamschiff.com/go/2907?c0=nov2024_abs_em.SALZ0e&refcode;=AU_ABS_FR_GEN_RES_AC90_20241101_PM1_V1_S1&email;=&t;=1012&akid;=8121%2E5257348%2EnSb5EY ]Will you rush in a contribution before our final GOTV weekend to make sure we reach the voters we need to turn out in droves in support of Kamala Harris, Tim Walz, and Democrats up and down the ballot? If you've saved your payment information with ActBlue Express, your donation will go through immediately: [ https://act.adamschiff.com/go/2142?c0=nov2024_abs_em.XLxVQB&refcode;=AU_ABS_FR_GEN_RES_AC90_20241101_PM1_V1_S1&email;=&amount;=10&t;=1013&akid;=8121%2E5257348%2EnSb5EY ]EXPRESS DONATE $10 [ https://act.adamschiff.com/go/2142?c0=nov2024_abs_em.XLxVQB&refcode;=AU_ABS_FR_GEN_RES_AC90_20241101_PM1_V1_S1&email;=&amount;=25&t;=1014&akid;=8121%2E5257348%2EnSb5EY ]EXPRESS DONATE $25 [ https://act.adamschiff.com/go/2142?c0=nov2024_abs_em.XLxVQB&refcode;=AU_ABS_FR_GEN_RES_AC90_20241101_PM1_V1_S1&email;=&amount;=50&t;=1015&akid;=8121%2E5257348%2EnSb5EY ]EXPRESS DONATE $50 [ https://act.adamschiff.com/go/2142?c0=nov2024_abs_em.XLxVQB&refcode;=AU_ABS_FR_GEN_RES_AC90_20241101_PM1_V1_S1&email;=&amount;=100&t;=1016&akid;=8121%2E5257348%2EnSb5EY ]EXPRESS DONATE $100 [ https://act.adamschiff.com/go/2142?c0=nov2024_abs_em.XLxVQB&refcode;=AU_ABS_FR_GEN_RES_AC90_20241101_PM1_V1_S1&email;=&amount;=250&t;=1017&akid;=8121%2E5257348%2EnSb5EY ]EXPRESS DONATE $250 [ https://act.adamschiff.com/go/1014?c0=nov2024_abs_em.7WX_lH&refcode;=AU_ABS_FR_GEN_RES_AC90_20241101_PM1_V1_S1&email;=&t;=1018&akid;=8121%2E5257348%2EnSb5EY ]ANOTHER AMOUNT Thank you, Derek. I’m not surprised Trump is spending his final moments on the campaign trail attacking me. He hasn’t changed, and he never will. — Adam [ https://act.adamschiff.com/go/4932?refcode=AU_ABS_FR_GEN_RES_AC90_20241101_PM1_V1_S1&email;=&t;=1019&akid;=8121%2E5257348%2EnSb5EY ]Adam Schiff for Senate Banner; text Schiff to 724433 [ https://act.adamschiff.com/go/1032?c0=nov2024_abs_em.vBSA2Z&refcode;=AU_ABS_FR_GEN_RES_AC90_20241101_PM1_V1_S1&email;=&t;=1020&akid;=8121%2E5257348%2EnSb5EY ]DONATE MONTHLY 135 E. Olive Ave., #750 Burbank CA, 91502 [ https://act.adamschiff.com/go/60?t=1002&akid;=8121%2E5257348%2EnSb5EY ]www.adamschiff.com | [ mailto:contact@adamschiff.com ]contact@adamschiff.com | [ https://act.adamschiff.com/go/64?t=1003&akid;=8121%2E5257348%2EnSb5EY ]Privacy Policy PAID FOR AND AUTHORIZED BY SCHIFF FOR SENATE You can unsubscribe from this mailing list at any time: http://act.adamschiff.com/cms/unsubscribe/unsubscribe/?akid=8121%2E5257348%2EnSb5EY
